H1: YanchengYuan
Office: TU 821



PolyU



Hong Kong SAR, China



I am an Assistant Professor in , The Hong Kong Polytechnic University, since July 01, 2024. I also serve as an Assistant Director at . I was an Assistant Professor (2023.04 – 2024.06) and a Research Assistant Professor (2021.04 – 2023.03) at , The Hong Kong Polytechnic University. Before that. I was a research fellow in , School of Computing, National University of Singapore, working with .



I obtained my PhD in Mathematics, from Department of Mathematics, National University of Singapore in 2020. My Ph.D supervisor is . I was fortunately supervised by from 2015 to 2018. Prior to NUS, I obtained my Bachelor’s degree in Computational Mathematics from University of Science and Technology of China (USTC) in 2015, where I was supervised by .



Contact : X + Y, where X = yancheng.yuan, Y = @polyu.edu.hk

name: Yancheng
content:
Contact : X + Y, where X = yancheng.yuan, Y = @polyu.edu.hk



Openings : I am looking for postdoctoral fellows with foundation models/model compression/scientific computing backgrounds to join our research group. Please feel free to send me an email with your CV if you are interested.
